name: Out of time 2 (Byte off 2020 demo)
description:
A NES demo/concept created using NESmaker for the 2020 byte off

Try to make your escape if you can!

(Life long Nes player excited to learn and create using NESmaker.  Hoping to one day create something to be proud of for my NES. Out of time 2 is in very early development stages and needs a lot of work. Thank you!)
